name: katalon-test-expert
description: Comprehensive Katalon test expert with insurance domain knowledge - craft expert test cases, analyze failures, generate HTML email reports, publish to Confluence, data-driven testing with MySQL/CSV, and deep insurance industry expertise (all 50 US states + global markets)

prerequisites.description: Requires MySQL client, Python 3, Firecrawl MCP for session scraping, and Atlassian MCP for JIRA integration
steps: Install MySQL client: brew install mysql-client (macOS) or apt-get install mysql-client (Linux)
Install Firecrawl MCP: npm install -g @firecrawl/mcp-server (for session scraping)
Install Atlassian MCP for JIRA integration: https://github.com/yoziru-desu/mcp-server-atlassian
Ensure Docker MySQL container is running with Katalon test database
Optional: Install jq for JSON processing: brew install jq
Configure MySQL connection via environment variables or Docker exec
Configure LogRocket/AWS Device Farm authentication (cookies or tokens)
